resources.string:
Shake your phone 5 times
to activate SOS and share
your location with your
emergency contacts.
Get instant help from the\nemergency government\nhelpline numbers.

Police siren to deter potential
attackers by creating the
illusion that the user has
activated an alarm or signal.
Hello, Welcome back!\nYou are safe with us.
“Stay fearless and confident with Suraksha\n- your personal safety guardian.”
An open-source Android app for instant SOS alerts\nwith location, enhancing women\'s safety in India
Almost there!\nWe\'ve sent you a verification email.
You need to verify your email address to log into Suraksha App.
Enter your Email ID to receive reset link!
• Navigate to \'Emergency Contacts\'. \n• Add up to 5 trusted contacts. \n• Ensure they are informed and understand their role.
• Press the SOS button to activate shake-to-alert. \n• For emergencies, shake your device more than five times to send an alert. \n• To deactivate, open Suraksha and click the SOS button again.
• Click \'Fake Siren\' to emit a loud siren. \n• Click again to stop the fake siren.
• Go to \'Emergency Helplines\'. \n• Tap on helpline to call immediately.
• After activating SOS, a notification appears indicating the active safety mode. \n• This works even if the app is in the background.
• Always be familiar with the app’s layout. \n• Keep the GPS active for precise location sharing. \n• Regularly update Suraksha for the latest features.

At Suraksha, our utmost priority is your safety along with the protection of your personal data. This Privacy Policy elucidates how Suraksha collects, uses, shares, and safeguards your information. By using our app, you consent to the practices detailed herein.

Personal Information: This encompasses details like your name, email address, phone number, age, address, pin code, city, and state.
 
Location Data: When the GPS is activated, your location coordinates are fetched for immediate response during SOS activations. If the GPS is off, we do not capture location but notify your emergency contacts regarding its status.
 
Emergency Contacts: These details are stored both in your phone's memory and the third-party database "Appwrite." For emergency alerts, the app utilizes contacts from your phone memory.

• To enable the core features of Suraksha, such as sending SOS alerts and GPS status during emergencies.
 
• To dispatch email notifications, reminders, updates, and newsletters pertinent to Suraksha.
 
• For internal analysis and enhancement of app functionalities.

Emergency Situations: In emergent situations, your location coordinates (if GPS is on) or GPS status (if off) are communicated to your emergency contacts.\n \nThird-party Service Providers: We employ the third-party database "Firebase Firestore" for saving emergency contact details. They access this specific data solely for this purpose and are contractually bound not to disclose or use it otherwise.

• We adopt best-in-class security protocols to shield your data from unauthorized intrusion, modification, or eradication.
 
• Both Suraksha and "Appwrite" uphold stringent security standards to guarantee data protection.
 
• Users are urged to maintain the confidentiality of their Suraksha account passwords.
• We sustain your personal data only for the duration necessary to serve the purposes for which it was collected, inclusive of any legal, accounting, or reporting prerequisites.

Access: You possess the right to request a copy of the personal data we retain about you.
 
Correction**: Upon identifying any inaccuracies in the data we hold about you, you have the right to ask for corrections.
 
Deletion: Under specific conditions, you can seek the deletion of your personal data.

• Periodically, this Privacy Policy might undergo revisions. Such changes take effect immediately upon posting. It is advisable for users to frequently revisit this section to stay abreast of any updates.
• For any uncertainties or concerns related to this Privacy Policy or the treatment of your data, feel free to connect with us at satverse.work@gmail.com.

At Suraksha, your safety and privacy are paramount. We are resolute in our commitment to uphold your trust by being transparent about our data practices and safeguarding your data diligently. We encourage users to acquaint themselves with our privacy ethos, and for any concerns, we are here to assist.\n \nThank you for opting for Suraksha. Prioritize safety!

Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using the Suraksha mobile application (\"the App\"), developed and provided by Satverse (\"us\", \"we\", or \"our\").\n\nBy accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms and Conditions, you must not access or use the App.

• The App is intended for personal use only and must not be used for any commercial purposes.\n \n• Users must be at least 13 years old to use the App. If you are under 13, you must obtain parental or guardian consent.

• We provide the App \"as is\", with all its features and functionalities. While we strive for accuracy and reliability, we do not guarantee the uninterrupted or error-free operation of the App.\n \n• Users must ensure their device’s GPS and other settings are accurate and functional, as the efficacy of the App depends on these.

• Users are responsible for the accuracy of the information provided during the signup process and for updating any changes to this information.\n \n• You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities under your account.

• Satverse shall not be held liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages, including, but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, data, or other intangibles, resulting from the use or inability to use the App.\n \n• While the App aims to aid in ensuring your safety, we do not guarantee prevention from harm or danger. Users should always prioritize personal safety beyond the use of the App.
• By using the App, you consent to our collection, use, and sharing of data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Ensure you read and understand the Suraksha Privacy Policy thoroughly.
• We may periodically update the App and these T&C. It\'s your responsibility to check these T&C regularly. Continued use of the App after any updates signifies your acceptance of the changes.

• We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our App without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these T&C or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.
• These T&C are governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict-of-law principles.

• Any disputes arising out of or relating to these T&C or the App shall be resolved through amicable negotiations. If such negotiations do not result in a mutually agreed-upon resolution, the dispute shall be referred to binding arbitration in Bhopal, India.
• If you have any concerns or questions regarding these T&C, please contact us at satverse.work@gmail.com.

We appreciate your trust in Suraksha and are dedicated to ensuring your safety. Always stay alert and prioritize your well-being. Thank you for choosing Suraksha.\n \nBy proceeding to use the Suraksha app, you indicate your understanding and acceptance of these Terms & Conditions.
I agree with all Terms of Use & Privacy Policy.
